archimate:ApplicationService.name: [PDAC] Create Run TIme Environment for a User (Application Service)
archimate:ApplicationService.documentation: Create run TIme Envoroment for a User is a funtion of Jupiter Lab. The Function creates a Kuberneted pod, and runs a designeted Jupyter Container within it. the Container has Access to Bqtch Facilites, SSH login to the head node assocaited wiht the Batach facilities
